title: Weird
body: I  was in a ranked game lobby and my game crashed (Legacy Client) and then said I couldn't join another game. https://gyazo.com/6c3800658a8c07b530d4522c9ed2b109 Then after that I get a leaver buster? Help?https://gyazo.com/6ef706459ff386cc22a051a57a4a58e4

replies.body:
It looks like your connection dropped to our matchmaking servers, then your PC was unable to establish another good connection to the matchmaking servers in order to get back in that match before being kicked out entirely. I strongly recommend [**configuring your network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) for League in order to prevent any incompatible settings from causing you issues.

Hit me up if you still encounter this after taking those steps.
